body: At 2nd level, an urban druid adds Diplomacy, Knowledge (history), Knowledge (local), and Knowledge (nobility) skills to her list of class skills. She also receives a +2 bonus on these skill checks. This ability replaces a druid's woodland stride and trackless step abilities.
name: Lorekeeper
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Urban Druid/Lorekeeper
